verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) I will give<WH3034> Thee thanks<WH3034> with all<WH3605> my heart;<WH3820> I will sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> to Thee before<WH5048> the gods.<WH430>

I will bow<WH7812> down<WH7812> toward<WH413> Thy holy<WH6944> temple,<WH1964> And give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thy name<WH8034> for Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> and Thy truth;<WH571> For Thou hast magnified<WH1431> Thy word<WH565> according<WH5921> to all<WH3605> Thy name.<WH8034>
On the day<WH3117> I called<WH7121> Thou didst answer<WH6030> me; Thou didst make<WH7292> me bold<WH7292> with strength<WH5797> in my soul.<WH5315>
All<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> will give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thee, O Lord,<WH3068> When<WH3588> they have heard<WH8085> the words<WH561> of Thy mouth.<WH6310>
And they will sing<WH7891> of the ways<WH1870> of the Lord.<WH3068> For great<WH1419> is the glory<WH9202> of the Lord.<WH3068>
For though<WH3588> the Lord<WH3068> is exalted,<WH7311> Yet He regards<WH7200> the lowly;<WH8217> But the haughty<WH1364> He knows<WH3045> from afar.<WH4801>

Though<WH518> I walk<WH1980> in the midst<WH7130> of trouble,<WH6869> Thou wilt revive<WH2421> me; Thou wilt stretch<WH7971> forth<WH7971> Thy hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> the wrath<WH639> of my enemies,<WH340> And Thy right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> will save<WH3467> me.

The Lord<WH3068> will accomplish<WH1584> what<WH1157> concerns<WH1157> me; Thy lovingkindness,<WH2617> O Lord,<WH3068> is everlasting;<WH5769> Do not forsake<WH7503> the works<WH4639> of Thy hands.<WH3027>
